nodes.text: A male drummer was part of a band with six fellow Humans in the early stages of the Galactic Civil War. In 1 ABY, that singer's band was popular on planet Kashyyyk, the homeworld of the Wookiees.

The Human drummer appeared in The Star Wars Holiday Special, a TV movie set in the Star Wars galaxy that aired in 1978. The band drummer was played by John Barbata, the lead vocalist of the real-life band Jefferson Starship, who portrayed a fictional band in the TV special.
